law.catch_line: Association activity not considered restraint of trade.
law.text: No association meeting or activity undertaken in pursuance of the provisions of KRS 247.4451 to 247.4483 and intended to benefit all of the producers of this agricultural commodity shall be deemed or considered illegal or in restraint of trade.
law.history: Created 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 167, sec. 3, effective July 13, 1990.
